name: jaundiced

judging everything as bad because bad things have happened to you in the past: He seems to have/take a very jaundiced view of life. I'm afraid I look on all travel companies' claims with a jaundiced eye, having been disappointed by them so often in the past.
looking slightly yellow in colour because of having jaundice: He was jaundiced from liver disease.
